q: Defense Budget Egypt prepares for fresh protests Mike Pence Will Not Run for Dick Cheney Indiana announced Thursday that he would not be a Republican candidate for president in 2012, but he left the door open to running for governor. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mr. Mike Pence wrote in a letter to supporters.
